title: The Lightstone
description: On the island continent of Ea, Morjin, immortal fallen angel and Lord of Lies, seeks to enslave the entire world, but can be destroyed by a legendary Lightstone. Valashu Elahad, the seventh and youngest Valeri prince of Mesh takes faithful Maram on a quest and discovers truths about friendship, courage, and love.
author: David Zindell
